artefact: Redress scheme registration for estate agencies

artefact.overview: You must join a redress scheme if you operate as as a residential estate agent
artefact.licence_short_description: Join an approved redress scheme as a residential property estate agent.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you operate as an estate agent and deal with residential property, you must join a redress scheme.

The current approved redress schemes are:

* [Property Ombudsman (TPOS)](http://www.tpos.co.uk/ "Property Ombudsman"){:rel="external"} 
* [Surveyors Ombudsman Service (SOS).](http://www.sosadvice.org.uk/ "Surveyors Ombudsman Service"){:rel="external"}

If don't join a redress scheme, you can be issued with a penalty charge notice.


*[TPOS]: Property Ombudsman
*[SOS]: Surveyors Ombudsman Service
